title: LOW PRIORITY MATCH
body: RIOT PLEASE FIX THIS.. MY NET GOT CUT WHILE PLAYING A RANKED GAME AND I GET LOW PRIORITY MATCH FOR NO REASON. THIS ISN'T FAIR. PLEASE HELP!

replies.body:
LeaverBuster does not issue punishments for one leave, you would have needed to leave at least a few times to be penalized. 

[Don’t be a leaver. Don’t get busted.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-NQK9hbhYrw0/VFEulhu574I/AAAAAAAAbt4/aYoNyJIX7yM/s1600/bbviahri-banner_0.jpg

If you're experiencing connectivity issues, let us know and we'll assist you with solving them.
